welcome_message_body: Welcome to Northampton, a charming city known for its quaint shops, lively arts scene, and picturesque New England scenery. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our city has to offer and making unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Santa Fe Tacos
restaurants.description: Santa Fe Tacos is a taco restaurant located in Northampton.

restaurants.name: Samuel Owens
restaurants.description: Samuel Owens is a american restaurant located in Coplay.

restaurants.name: Main Street Family Restaurant
restaurants.description: Main Street Family Restaurant is a american restaurant located in Northampton.

restaurants.name: Dunkin'
restaurants.description: Dunkin' is a donut shop located in Northampton.

restaurants.name: Eastern Chinese
restaurants.description: Eastern Chinese is a chinese restaurant located in Northampton.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Doylestown Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Doylestown Airport is reserved for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Trenton Mercer Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Upper Bucks Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers luxurious amenities.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is home to American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights and is home to numerous airlines including Delta, JetBlue, and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights and is home to United Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
